channel.title: Freenationz, Bringing democracy to the RS world
channel.description:
[U]WE ARE A DEMOCRATIC SERVER[/U][B][/B]
What does that mean?
It means that people elect the staff and choose what the server should and should not have. People applying for staff must have a majority of yes votes. They must have atleast 5 - 10 supporters BEFORE applying and a yes from staff. If anyone wants to suggest, again suggest it then a majority of yes votes must be taken and if it can be done it will be
Staff --------------- - Disastrcall (owner) - cooldude (Co-owner) - pk_tk (mod) - Admin (needed) - Admin (needed) - Mod (needed) - Mod (needed) - Forum mod (needed)
Features -------------- - No lag, 24-7. - Stable economy. - Perfect combat - 5+ bosses (but only 1 for the beta rest will be added later) - 3 quests - Full pest control - Full Castle Wars (will be added after beta) - Full duel arena ( will be added after beta) - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn. - Perfect Switching. - Regular community events & drop parties. - Bank pins - Great and proffesional forums ( Official forum is Freenationz.com but it is currently under attack by a virus so until that is fixed the forum is freenationz.boards.net) - Download client at the temporary site
Note: Need jre7 to run the client and DOWNLOAD is at the TEMPORARY site
Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?86wlehyo2vd359x]http://www.mediafire.com/?86wlehyo2vd359x[/url]
Home: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/flln5i.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/15mmjvp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/dc5uer.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/k98n4.png[/img]
Boss:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2r4q7pw.png[/img]
Edgeville:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/17abzs.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/sfidz8.jpg[/img] (Supply store for pk)
Agility course:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/snjkt1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/23qhrp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/295zomd.png[/img]
Rune essence mine:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1hxams.png[/img]
I realize that the rune essence mine is random. Anyways, I think out of all the servers I've played Dodian was the best. So I'm trying to make the economy as much as possible similar to Dodian.

item.title: Freenationz, Bringing democracy to the RS world
item.dc:creator: @disastercall disastercall
item.description:
@disastercall wrote:

You have a point if you mean that people will elect based on friends and etc… But I’m confident it’ll work and they’ll always 1 - 2 staff thats probably always ganna stay so they can make sure it does including myself. Worth a try. Ok lsn everyone, incase im afk on the server don’t rage and logout… Lol.

Alot of ppl have logged in asked me questions, saw I wasnt there, raged then left. Just chill register to the forums if u have a question and I’ll see it as soon as possible

Read full topic
item.source: Freenationz, Bringing democracy to the RS world

item.description:
@disastercall wrote:

WE ARE A DEMOCRATIC SERVER

What does that mean?

It means that people elect the staff and choose what the server should and should not have. People applying for staff must have a majority of yes votes. They must have atleast 5 - 10 supporters BEFORE applying and a yes from staff. If anyone wants to suggest, again suggest it then a majority of yes votes must be taken and if it can be done it will be

Staff

  • Disastrcall (owner)
  • cooldude (Co-owner)
  • pk_tk (mod)
  • Admin (needed)
  • Admin (needed)
  • Mod (needed)
  • Mod (needed)

Features

  • No lag, 24-7.
  • Stable economy.
  • Perfect combat
  • 5+ bosses (but only 1 for the beta rest will be added later)
  • 3 quests
  • Full pest control
  • Full Castle Wars (will be added after beta)

  • All npcs have a good variety of drops.
  • Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn.

  • Regular community events & drop parties.
  • Bank pins
  • Great and proffesional forums ( Official forum is Freenationz.com but it is currently under attack by a virus so until that is fixed the forum is freenationz.boards.net)
